DataElement.preferredName: Access Extension Study Protocol Version Multiple Institution Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An action plan of a pre-clinical or clinical study describing the procedure for obtaining an experimental drug or device for subjects who are not adequately treated by existing therapy, who do not meet eligibility criteria for enrollment, or who are otherwise unable to participate in a controlled clinical study. NOTE(S): This type of study is used to register all types of non-protocol access to experimental treatments, including protocol exception, single-patient IND, treatment IND, compassionate use, emergency use, continued access and parallel track. Specifies whether a study is designed to be conducted at more than one site concurrently.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Access Extension Study Protocol Version Multiple Institution Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.:An addition to the length of something; the spreading of something into new regions.:The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._Having, relating to, or consisting of more than one individual, element, part, or other component; manifold. (dictionary.com):An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.:An addition to the length of something; the spreading of something into new regions.:The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

Concepts.definition: The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.
To increase in length or duration.

The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having, relating to, or consisting of more than one individual, element, part, or other component; manifold. (dictionary.com):An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: Having, relating to, or consisting of more than one individual, element, part, or other component; manifold.

An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
